name: AddMindmapNode
description:
Add a new mind map node to a Miro board.

This tool adds a new node to a mind map on a Miro board. It can create root or child nodes with specified x, y coordinates for positioning. Use it when you want to expand a mind map with additional nodes on a specified board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the new mind map node will be created.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to create the item.

parameters.name: node_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of mind map node. Use 'text' as the current valid type.

value_schema.description: Type of item used as mind map node. Currently, `type` can only be equal to `text`.

parameters.name: mindmap_node_content
parameters.description: The text content to display within the mind map node.

value_schema.description: The actual text (content) that appears in the mind map node.

parameters.name: x_coordinate
parameters.description: X-axis coordinate for node placement on the board. Defaults to `0`, placing the node at the center along the x-axis.

value_schema.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: y_coordinate
parameters.description: Y-coordinate for item placement on the board. Defaults to 0 if not specified, placing it at the board's center.

value_schema.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: node_width_pixels
parameters.description: Width of the mind map node in pixels. Specifies how wide the node will appear on the board.

value_schema.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: parent_frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent node or frame for the mind map node.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.
